name: X WaterMan
description:
Authentic 3D scenes with realistic physical G-Sensor!!!
Applied with advanced Unity3D game engine!!!
Come on! Take up your phone and DOWNLOAD it now!!!

**Game Features**
**Three Role physical forms available
**Surprising innovations make you want to try it again and again.
**Super realistic scenes with majestic and exquisite graphics
**Easy and fluent control and playmode
**Collect gold by jumping or sliding when dodge obstacles
**Fine, lovely and exquisite graphics

Introduction:
X WaterMan is an adventure game with thrilling challenges in primeval forest.
Players need to dodge revolving leaves, various traps, evil giants and they freeze and avoid being cremated.
Lead your hero to stop or march in appropriate time in the changeable ambience.Be careful, do not slip down on ice or burnt by boiling lava.Resplendent visual effect with 3D mazes in each level.
Crawl, run or jump to dodge all fatal traps and finally get to the destination.
Collect hidden gold to complete all achievements and improve your blood, shield and speed.

Game History：
The water kingdom in X world was about to be destroyed soon in the war. The Diviner foretold that only the man whose blood cells were blue can wind down the whole thing, and you, WaterMan! Now, take this mysterious holy water, set out to the castle of Devil of fire!
